summary: The announcement provides additional information regarding the proposed private placement, specifically clarifying the utilization of proceeds based on minimum and maximum scenarios, detailing allocations for acquisition of PMSB, working capital, and estimated expenses.

utilisation_of_proceeds.details: To fully fund the acquisition of 30% equity interest in Propel Maxflo Sdn Bhd (PMSB).
utilisation_of_proceeds.timeframe: Within 12 months from the receipt of funds

utilisation_of_proceeds.amount: RM2.982 million (minimum scenario) / RM4.408 million (maximum scenario)
utilisation_of_proceeds.details: For renewable energy activities, including financing charges, staff-related costs, and general administrative expenses.
utilisation_of_proceeds.timeframe: Within 12 months from the receipt of funds

utilisation_of_proceeds.details: For professional fees, regulatory fees, and other incidental expenses related to the private placement.
utilisation_of_proceeds.timeframe: Upon completion of the Proposed Private Placement
